item.title: IEEE Euro S&P 2022 - Available Papers
item.author: evans@virginia.edu (Euro S&P Program Chairs)
item.description: The following papers that have been accepted to appear in the 7th IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy are now openly available. All Papers · List By Authors · Institutions 0 open papers

item.title: IEEE EuroS&P 2022 - Accepted Papers
item.author: evans@virginia.edu (Euro S&P Program Chairs)
item.description: The following papers have been accepted to the 7th IEEE European Symposium on Security and Privacy to be held June 6-10, 2022 in Genoa, Italy. List By Authors · Institutions · Papers by Topic aaeCAPTCHA: The Design and Implementation of Audio Adversarial CAPTCHAMd Imran Hossen, Xiali HeiCaptcha me if you can: Imitation Games with Reinforcement LearningIlias Tsingenopoulos, Davy Preuveneers, Lieven Desmet, Wouter JoosenCompositional Information Flow Monitoring for Reactive ProgramsMcKenna McCall, Abhishek Bichhawat, Limin JiaCostCO: An automatic cost modeling framework for secure multi-party computationVivian Fang, Lloyd Brown, William Lin, Wenting Zheng, Aurojit Panda, Raluca PopaCross Chain Atomic Swaps in the Absence of Time via Attribute Verifiable Timed CommitmentsYacov Manevich, Adi AkaviaDifficult for Thee, But Not for Me: Measuring the Difficulty and User Experience of Remediating Persistent IoT MalwareElsa Rodr√≠guez, Max Fukkink, Simon Parkin, Michel van Eeten, Carlos Hernandez GananDNN Model Architecture Fingerprinting Attack on CPU-GPU Edge DevicesKartik Patwari, Syed Mahbub Hafiz, Han Wang, Houman Homayoun, Zubair Shafiq, Chen-Nee ChuahDynamic Backdoor Attacks Against Machine Learning ModelsAhmed Salem, Rui Wen, Michael Backes, Shiqing Ma, Yang ZhangDynamic Policies RevisitedAmir M.

item.title: IEEE EuroS&P 2022 - Topics
item.author: evans@virginia.edu (Euro S&P Program Chairs)
item.description: Topics are based on selections by the authors. The same paper may be listed under multiple topics. Access control SAUSAGE: Security Analysis of Unix domain Socket Usage in Android (Mounir Elgharabawy, Blas Kojusner, Mohammad Mannan, Kevin R. B. Butler, Byron Williams, Amr Youssef) Transparent DIFC: Harnessing Innate Application Event Logging for Fine-Grained Decentralized Information Flow Control (Jason Liu, Anant Kandikuppa, Adam Bates) Adversarial Machine Learning aaeCAPTCHA: The Design and Implementation of Audio Adversarial CAPTCHA (Md Imran Hossen, Xiali Hei) Captcha me if you can: Imitation Games with Reinforcement Learning (Ilias Tsingenopoulos, Davy Preuveneers, Lieven Desmet, Wouter Joosen) Dynamic Backdoor Attacks Against Machine Learning Models (Ahmed Salem, Rui Wen, Michael Backes, Shiqing Ma, Yang Zhang) GRAPHITE: Generating Automatic Physical Examples for Machine-Learning Attacks on Computer Vision Systems (Ryan Feng, Neal Mangaokar, Jiefeng Chen, Earlence Fernandes, Somesh Jha, Atul Prakash) Towards Fair and Robust Classification (Haipei Sun, Kun Wu, Ting Wang, Hui (Wendy) Wang) TrojanZoo: Towards Unified, Holistic, and Practical Evaluation of Neural Backdoors (Ren Pang, Zheng Zhang, Xiangshan Gao, Zhaohan Xi, Shouling Ji, Peng Cheng, Xiapu Luo, Ting Wang) Application security Fuzzing with Data Dependency Information (Alessandro Mantovani, Andrea Fioraldi, Davide Balzarotti) HARM: Hardware-assisted Continuous Re-randomization for Microcontrollers (Jiameng Shi, Le Guan, Wenqiang Li, Dayou Zhang, Ping Chen, Ning Zhang) Lightweight, Multi-Stage, Compiler-Assisted Application Specialization (Mohannad Alhanahnah, Rithik Jain, Vaibhav Rastogi, Somesh Jha, Thomas Reps) xTag: Mitigating Use-After-Free Vulnerabilitiesvia Software-Based Pointer Tagging on Intel x86-64 (Lukas Bernhard, Michael Rodler, Thorsten Holz, Lucas Davi) Attacks on systems DNN Model Architecture Fingerprinting Attack on CPU-GPU Edge Devices (Kartik Patwari, Syed Mahbub Hafiz, Han Wang, Houman Homayoun, Zubair Shafiq, Chen-Nee Chuah) HyperLogLog: Exponentially Bad in Adversarial Settings (Kenny Paterson, Mathilde Raynal) LockedDown: Exploiting Contention on Host-GPU PCIe Bus for Fun and Profit (Mert Side, Fan Yao, Zhengkai Zhang) SAUSAGE:
